About The OpportunityAs Noodle.ai scales, we are looking for a Principal Product Strategist with deep expertise in supply chain planning to help shape the next generation of probabilistic planning systems. You understand the existing landscape of planning technology... and you think bigger. You have a profound intellectual curiosity and are hungry to make a mark on the world by bringing the power of AI-native software to revolutionize supply chain.As a Principal Product Strategist, you will leverage your strong understanding of supply chain planning processes and systems to play a key role in shaping strategic product development. This will include partnering with leadership and cross-functional partners in engineering and GTM functions to both improve our design and development processes and refine the way we position our products in the market. You will engage in activities ranging from analyzing market and competitive conditions, to sales enablement activities to position the differentiated value of our products, to gathering and analyzing user feedback to craft a product strategy that delivers exceptional customer value.Ultimately, you are a team-player hungry to make an impact.About You Must have: >6 years of experience in a dynamic product role (ex. Product Strategy, Product Management, Solution/ Product Deployment) Deep domain knowledge in Supply Chain planning (preference for both supply and demand planning) Understanding of current supply chain planning technology landscape (especially planning systems and supporting tools) Interested in and excited about AI/ML Ability to think outside the box to create a next generation supply chain planning tool Proven success in overseeing all elements of the product development lifecycle Skilled at working effectively with cross functional teams in a matrixed organization Strong problem-solving skills and willingness to roll up one's sleeves to get the job done Excellent written and verbal communication skills Solid technical background with understanding of software development (preference for work experience in an Enterprise SaaS product environment) Helpful to have: Experience working at a supply chain software company (preferred with a product management role and at a supply chain planning company) Technical understanding of how AI/ML works Technical understanding of enterprise-grade software solutions Our ValuesYou are a leader who embodies the values at the core of Noodle's culture: BCHILL. Bring it - Be present. Bring your whole self and all your unique talents and perspective. Connect - Build lasting relationships with customers, colleagues, and our communities. Help - Help the people around you succeed—customers & colleagues. Ask for help. Give to the future. Innovate - Lead boldly. Contribute intellectually. Cherish innovative ideas. Learn - Become more valuable. Have confidence & humility to learn. Teach others. Live - Have fun. Relish the journey. Keep perspective. Be real. Improve people's lives. About Noodle.aiAt Noodle.ai our mission is to create a world without waste. We think traditional rules-based software is failing business leaders, so we're developing next-generation Probabilistic Supply Chain Planning software that leverages Enterprise Artificial Intelligence to tackle volatility in supply chains. We are a diverse and interdisciplinary team, looking for collaborative and intellectually curious Noodlers hungry to learn from other perspectives, create together, and have fun along the way. Want to help shape the future of Supply Chain Planning? Let's noodle.
